name: Ultimate Drawing Pad
description:
Drawing Pad is a mobile art studio for all ages! Create your own art using magic glow brush, chalk, pencil, stickers and more! Create Movie clips to record the drawing procedure!

Cool Features:

● 10+ Magical brushes: crayon, glow, rainbow, chalk, metal, pen, pencil, wool, etc
● "Sticker Brush" to make your drawing colorful and much fun
● Create Movie clips to record the drawing procedure from Gallery
● Import photos directly from photo library as background
● Build-in Gallery - Continue yours' drawing at Any time
● Save your drawing to Photo Library and share with friends via Email, Facebook or Twitter
